body.p:
Covington Ky -- July 28th 1862
Hon Beriah Magoffin
Governor &c
Dear Sir

Enclosed find certified copy of Indictment against Thomas Hart & Michael Kennedy on charge of Grand Larceny &c_ found at the June Term 1862 of the Circuit Court for the County of Kenton and were there penidng and undetermined
Said Hart and Kennedy have fled and are now fugitives from the Justice of this State
I am credibly informed that Hart and Kennedy are harboring and concealing themselves in the adjoining state of Ohio

I therefore appeal to your Excellency for a Requisition upon the Executive of this State for the arrest and delivery of Said fugitives from Justice to an agent of your Excellency's appointment, for the reception of the Fugitives and I respectfully sug-
gest the name of Clinton Butts marshall of this City as a suitable person for the appointment of agent

W. E. Arthur
Atty for Comth

Ohio
Demand for Thos Hart & M. Kennedy
Grand Larceny
Issd Aug. 1st. 1862
